H3.text: who did carlos boozer play for. Utah Jazz

A4.text: On July 8, 2010, Boozer was acquired by the Chicago Bulls in a sign-and-trade deal with the Jazz, signing a 5-year, $75 million contract.

A5.text: On July 17, 2014, Boozer was claimed off amnesty waivers by the Los Angeles Lakers.

A6.text: The Jazz acquired Carlos Boozer as a free agent during the off-season.
